The seller has been banned. He probably cannot answer.
I won't comment on the politics on the banning, but Brett is a reliable and trustworthy seller. Buy with confidence.

[quote name="wazoo" post=2295962]I won't comment on the politics on the banning, but Brett is a reliable and trustworthy seller. Buy with confidence.[/QUOTE]

There were no politics, I assure you. He blatantly lied to me and all can see it in the thread and emails posted. I received several emails, from 20+ yr member friends, about this guy being a bad actor after that thread was posted. Go do business with him somewhere else.  Too many lies and deceit. I have the emails to prove it.   That all said, no doubt he did some good deals. That doesn't take away from his lies. 
.
